content: छंदस् {%<ab>n.</ab>%} [छंदयति असुन्] {@--1@} Wish, desire, fancy, will, pleasure; ( गृह्णीयात्) मूर्खं छंदोऽनुवृत्तेन याथातथ्येन पंडितं <ls>Chāṇ. 33.</ls> {@--2@} Free will, free or wilful conduct. {@--3@} Meaning, intention. {@--4@} Fraud, trick, deceit. {@--5@} The Vedas, the sacred text of the Vedic hymns; स च कुलपतिराद्यश्छंदसां यः प्रयोक्ता <ls>U. 3. 48</ls>; बहुलं छंदसि frequently used by Pāṇini; प्रणवश्छंदसामिव <ls>R. 1. 11</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 143</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 95.</ls> {@--6@} A metre; ऋक्छंदसा आशास्ते <ls>Ś. 4</ls>; गायत्री छंदसामहं <ls>Bg. 10. 35</ls>; <ls n="Bg.">13. 4.</ls> {@--7@} Metrical science, prosody; (regarded as one of the six Vedāngas or auxiliaries to the Vedas, the other five being शिक्षा, व्याकरण, कल्प, निरुक्त and ज्योतिष).
